overview: One of the most successful rock bands of all time, with over 100 million records sold, 2,700 concerts performed in over 50 countries for more than 34 million fans and winners of countless awards to this concert! It will be captured in April and will be a nonstop show of their greatest hits with a few surprise tracks sprinkled in. The never-before-seen show was recorded live, exclusively for this one-night only event.
tagline: Experience Bon Jovi perform like never before....in BLACK AND WHITE!
title: Bon Jovi from Encore Nights
